description: Children should grow up in optimal conditions
title: I am healthy!
content:
All children have the right to live and grow up under safe and healthy conditions.

All children have the right to the best healthcare possible, to safe drinking water, to nutritious food, to safe and unpolluted local environments, and to information that can help them remain in good health.

Parents and local communities should do everything to ensure children’s access to the best medical services and the best possible health conditions.

Children have the right to a standard of living that is sufficient for their proper physical, mental, spiritual, moral and social development. If their parents or caregivers have difficulty feeding, clothing or housing them, state or local authorities should step in to assist them.

Every child has the right to be protected against poverty.  If a family or caregivers lack sufficient resources to raise a child, states or local authorities should provide the child with access to food, housing, education and other resources necessary for that child to develop properly and in good health.
